org.trianacode.gui.windows

Interface WizardListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandLineWizard, UnitWizard

    public interface WizardListener
    An interface implemented by a class that received notification when finish or cancel are selected on a wizard.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelSelected(WizardWindow window)
      Called when cancel is selected on the wizard
      void finishSelected(WizardWindow window)
      Called when finish is selected on the wizard
      void panelSelected(WizardWindow window, int index)
      Called when the specified panel index is make visible
